title: Daredevil: Marvel Knights, Vol. 1
description: A tragic accident took his sight-but in return, enhanced Matt Murdock's remaining senses far beyond human limits. An accomplished attorney by day, by night Murdock seeks justice outside the law as Daredevil, The Man Without Fear. When Marvel Knights took hold of this classic Marvel Comics character, two incredible stories redefined Daredevil for a new generation, now collected into this single volume.
author: Kevin  Smith
